item.title: RoninDojo x86 Installation Guide
item.description:
The author would like to thank Estudio Bitcoin, and personally Albercoin and Arkad, for their work on installing RoninDojo on x86.
Installation of “vanilla” Dojo is described in official documentation by Samourai and in guide by ð•‚ð•â„‚ðŸ›.

During the arrest of the Samourai Wallet developers on April 24, 2024, the Whirlpool coordinator’s servers and the OXT blockchain explorer were also shut down by intelligence agencies. Therefore, starting with RoninDojo v2.1.4, the Whirlpool tools, WST and Boltzmann calculator have been removed from the code.

item.title: GrapheneOS: De-Google your phone
item.description:
This guide by Bitcoin Q+A was published on bitcoiner.guide website.

Contribute.

What is GrapheneOS? #

â€œGrapheneOS is a privacy and security focused mobile OS with Android app compatibility developed as a non-profit open source project.â€

GrapheneOS, originally founded in 2014 as â€˜CopperheadOSâ€™ is based on the traditional Android Code (AOSP), but with many changes and improvements aimed at improving user privacy and security. GrapheneOS puts the user in control of their phone, not the big tech companies.
